title: Error when trying to save or send message on Linux
content:
Hello, I've had some random error crop up on my Ubuntu install of Thunderbird. It suddenly won't let me do anything with outgoing email, whether that's saving a draft or sending it. This happens regardless of which email account and server it's on (both MS and Google) and no matter what is in the message. I have no issues getting messages or moving things around folder to folder within Thunderbird. I also do not have this issue on my various Mac installations using the same email accounts. Based on some other digging, I've already tried resetting my OAuth tokens and that did nothing. I've run the developer console and found the following messages when trying to save:

mailnews.send: NS_ERROR_FAILURE: Component returned failure code: 0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE) [nsIFile.createUnique] 

   createMessageFile resource:///modules/MimeMessage.sys.mjs:69    createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:145    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SaveAsDraft chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7069    Save chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7047    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1044    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1

MessageSend.sys.mjs:147:32 

   createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:147    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SaveAsDraft chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7069    Save chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7047    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1044    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1

mailnews.send: Sending failed; , exitCode=2147500037, originalMsgURI= MessageSend.sys.mjs:341:32 

   fail resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:341    createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:155    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SaveAsDraft chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7069    Save chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7047    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1044    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1


Then I get something similar when trying to send: mailnews.send: NS_ERROR_FAILURE: Component returned failure code: 0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE) [nsIFile.createUnique] 

   createMessageFile resource:///modules/MimeMessage.sys.mjs:69    createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:145    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SendMessageWithCheck chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7021    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1116    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1

MessageSend.sys.mjs:147:32 

   createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:147    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SendMessageWithCheck chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7021    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1116    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1

mailnews.send: Sending failed; , exitCode=2147500037, originalMsgURI= MessageSend.sys.mjs:341:32 

   fail resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:341    createAndSendMessage resource:///modules/MessageSend.sys.mjs:155    CompleteGenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6446    GenericSendMessage chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:6362    SendMessageWithCheck chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:7021    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1116    doCommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/MsgComposeCommands.js:1261    goDoCommand chrome://messenger/content/globalOverlay.js:99    oncommand chrome://messenger/content/messengercompose/messengercompose.xhtml:1


What on earth is going on here? It looks like it's failing to actually create the file that holds the message and that failure prevents anything else from happening. Thanks!

title: Wiadomości oznaczone jako przeczytane
content: Witam. Mam na 2 komputerach stacjonarnych aplikację Thunderbird. Mam na nich podpięte te same adresy mailowe. Oprócz tego te same adresy mailowe mamy skonfigurowane na 2 smartfonach (w aplikacji outlook i gmail). W tym momencie jest tak, że na komputerach jak przychodzą maile, to są oznaczone jako nieprzeczytane. Problem jest wtedy jak te same maile wpadają na smartfona, to od razu przekształcają się jako przeczytane w Thunderbird, mimo, że w ogóle ich nie ruszałem w smartfonach. To dotyczy jednego konta mailowego. Na innym jest tak, że w Thunderbird jest jako nieoznaczony mail cały czas, ale jak go tam przeczytam, to na drugim komputerze w Thunderbird odznacza się i jest jako przeczytany, mimo ,że go się nie otwierało. Dlaczego tak się dzieje? Jak zrobić, żeby wszystkie wiadomości, które wpadają do konkretnego Thubderbird były cały czas oznaczone jako nieprzeczytane, dopóki je faktycznie przeczytamy tylko w tym konkretnym programie? Mam nadzieję, że wszystko jest zrozumiałe

title: I can receive email through Thunderbird but I can't send any emails.  Who ever controls this can close this thread.  I am not wasting anymore time with Thunderbird.
content:
This all started when I cancelled Xfinity Internet and went to Frontier Internet. I had previously used Thunderbird for 8 years through Xfinity with no problems. I have contacted Xfinity and Frontier and both have told me it is a problem with a Thunderbird setting.

This is the error message I receive..........

Sending of the message failed. An error occured while sending mail: Outgoing mail server (smtp) error. The server responded: resomta-c2p-555920.sys.comcast.net resonta-c2p-555920 sys.comcast.net. Excessive failed authentication. ESMTP server temporarily not available.

I have since cancelled Thunderbird and removed the program from my laptop but still have it on my Desktop computer. I am still receiving the same error message on my desktop. Everything is the same setting it has been for eight years. The only change I made was cancelling my Xfinity TV, Internet and mobile phone service. I still have Xfinity email.

title: la posta viene inviata con un'altro account!
content: ciao a tutti. ho un fastidiosissimo problema, non so se dovuto a qualche trojan ma non credo. Su Thunderbird ho 4 account di posta, A-B-C-D smtp predefinito per posta in uscita quello C ( gmail) quando spedisco la posta, da qualunque account, al ricevente arriva sempre con la mail collegata al server predefinito di posta in uscita! ovvero con l'indirizzo C. se cambio il predefinito in smtp di B (sempre gmail) tutte le mail arriveranno con l'indirizzo di B. in allegato uno screenshot della conf SMTP. in pratica tutte gli account vengono inviati con la mail collegata a quel nome utente ( ovvero quel nome utente in parte oscurato) spero di essere stato chiaro. ho avuto già questo problema l'anno scorso, dovetti penare non poco per risolverlo e non mi ricordo come!!. ho già cambiato le password di quasi tutti gli account per capire se ci fosse stata qualche violazione, ma il problema persiste. questa cosa mi sta impedendo di usare la posta per lavoro, tramite Thundebird. Dal SERVER funziona tutto bene, per cui è un problema dentro thunderbird. grazie a chi saprà aiutarmi. se volete sapere altri parametri chiedete pure grazie

title: 128.6.0esr bug? attempt to edit draft with "store draft encrypted" enabled erases body of message
content:
Thought I'd bring this up here first just in case - but pretty sure this is a bug.

With the “Store draft messages in encrypted format” setting enabled, whether I double click the DRAFT message or click the Edit button on the draft, when it opens, the body of the email is empty. The From, To and subject are all there - just no message body. If I close the write window and discard changes, the message is still there.

I performed a clean install of 128.6.0esr and the same thing occurs. When I rolled back this morning to 128.5.2esr, I performed multiple tests on new drafts, old drafts, exiting, restarting, all with the encrypted format setting enabled and there is no issue with attempting to edit the draft on the previous version.

Can someone else confirm this? It seems like a bug to me. Thanks!
creator: design20

Not sure if something got broken in the new update...

title: Open just one single message as plain text
content:
Is there any way to open just one particular message that is in the Thunderbird inbox as plain text, without changing the setting for all messages?

I've read solutions that say to: Go to the "View" menu at the top of the Thunderbird window; Choose "Message Body As" > "Plain Text".

If I follow those instructions, then all subsequent messages that I open are also displayed as plain text, until I change that option back. That's not the solution I'm hoping for.

I've also read that I can right-click a message in the inbox ... Select "View" from the context menu; Choose "Message Body As" > "Plain Text".

but I have no "View" option in the context menu.

When I get a message from a sender which I suspect might be a scam, it would be very helpful from a security standpoint to be able to easily open just that one suspicious message as plain text.

Is there any way to do this? I've also looked for an add-on which might enable me to do this, but couldn't find one.

Any suggestions appreciated, thanks!
creator: hommealone

title: Thunderbird is no longer getting email on my computer.  New email is available on my phone, but not on my laptop
content: New email is not being downloaded on my computer
creator: anastasia4

title: Verdwenen berichten
content:
Op mijn ipad heb ik een mail-app draaiende in IMAP. Deze is gelinkt aan lijn telenet webmail. Op mijn windows computer werk ik met thunderbird in POP.

Regelmatig download ik mijn mails op mijn windows pc (met thunderbird) om daar mijn mails te beheren. Na het downloaden worden de mails in mijn telenet inbox verwijderd. De berichten verschijnen dus ook niet meer op mijn ipad.

Dit werkt al jaren zonder problemen tot op vandaag. De mails zijn uit mijn telenet inbox verdwenen maar ... zijn niet gedownload. Met als gevolg dat de berichten verloren zijn!!!

Ik weet dat er in dit proces verschillende actoren betrokken zijn, maar hebben jullie een idee wat er kan misgelopen zijn en of ik de verloren berichten ergens zou kunnen terugvinden. Ik stelde ook de vraag bij mijn provider (Telenet).

Alvast bedankt.

eugeen.vanhoof@telenet.be

title: Firefox and Paypal...and not receiving notifications
content:
I asked this question a year ago and never received the response. I just looked in my account and the correspondance was archived.

I still am having trouble with Firefox blocking Paypal and I dont' know what other settings I can change. I've added the company to the exceptions page.

And I see I asked about trying to donate before. I am not receiving emails from Thunderbird when I get a response. One of the messages from you said your couldnt find wwwoolf. I don't understand. I've logged in under wwwoolf and I see it right there in the upper left of this page. email is wwwoolf@alaska.net
creator: wwwwoolf

title: Thunderbird não pôde compactar a pasta Lixeira em Hotmail
content:
Hoje, 13/1/2025, ao realizar a compactação de minhas 2 contas (GMail e Hotmail), passei a receber a mensagem : A pasta "Lixeira em Hotmail" não pôde ser compactada porque houve falha ao escrever nela. Verifique se há espaço suficiente em disco e se você tem permissão de escrita no sistema de arquivos, depois tente novamente. Não tenho problema com as outras pastas, sejam elas da conta Gmail ou Hotmail. As pastas Lixeira, tanto do GMail quanto do Hotmail estão vazias. Isso ocorre quando realizo tanto a compactação total das contas quanto individualmente de cada pasta. O problema ocorre somente na pasta Lixeira da conta Hotmail.

Obrigado.

Jose Pinho.
creator: jcgpinho

title: Lost all my Email
content:

I have version 128.6.8esr 64 bit

Not sure what has caused this and I can get all my older email back? Paul
creator: psm.devere

title: Etichette
content:
Ho due problemi con le etichette dopo aver cambiato computer. Il primo è che inserendo i nomi delle etichette, queste vengono messe in ordine alfabetico e non in quello precedente. Dopo anni di utilizzo la cosa è piuttosto scocciante...

Il secondo è che nel raggruppamento dei messaggi per etichette, questi vengono raddoppiati. Invece nella cartella Posta in Arrivo no. E questo è più grave.

MacBook Pro M4 Pro, macOS 15.2 Thunderbird 128.6.0esr (64 bit)
creator: bertofa

creator: dmcmain

title: "Apply current view"
content:
When I select a folder with the columns and column widths set the way I want, then do "Apply current view to > Folder and its children > Local > Local" Thunderbird applies the view to some, but not all, folders. Even if I target a problem folder and explicitly attempt to apply the desired current view to it, it doesn't work. If I create a new blank folder as a sub-folder of a folder that *does* accept current views, I can't apply the current view to the sub-folder. It retains what appears to be a default view.

I can't see any difference between folders that accept "current view" and those that do not. Any suggestions? Or is there a way to set the default view (i.e., columns and column widths, not just sort order) for new folders?
creator: coffent1
